lastfm.summary: Nothing Else Matters is 8th track off Metallica's famous "Metallica" album (referred often to as "the Black Album" due to the cover art). The album has sold over 25 million copies world wide. It was Metallica's first more pop-sounding album. The track was composed and written by James Hetfield to his girlfriend whom he missed during long touring sessions. The famous introduction was born quite by accident, during a telephone conversation with his girlfriend: James held the receiver with one hand Read more on Last.fm.
